name: MMR Interactive
overview:
MMR Interactive is a local interactive company specializing in assisting small to midsized businesses establish an online presence.

In today’s business market every company must have web presence! Due to the fact that the Internet is where people go for their information, if a business can not be found on the Internet, they are missing out on a big piece of the pie.

Many small businesses still do NOT have a website because:

  • They do not know how to get one
  • They think it is too expensive

MMR offers cost effective solutions for small to mid-sized businesses in need of web presence. They have an experienced team of designers and developers to produce dynamic websites for any kind of business.
